name: frosty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very cold, with a thin layer of white ice covering everything: The frosty air stung my cheeks. It was a cold and frosty morning.
If someone, or someone's behaviour, is frosty, they are unfriendly and not welcoming: He gave me a frosty look.frosty reception The chairperson's plan received a frosty reception from the committee.
